about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 203: Elemental Undead

Have your undead enemies been beaten to (un)death? Need a little something to liven up your next necrotic encounter? Grab these evocative Elemental Undead and fret no more! You’ve got 32 new servants of the unclean ready to reap your heroes souls! From skeletal dragons and emaciated hounds, to flaming bone warriors, negative energy neophytes and fiery skulls of doom! They may be undead, but these mystical monstrosities are certain to liven up your next adventure!
